item.title: Mario Kart Dashboard Project Part 1
item.description: I was watching Youtube videos (as I am doing so often), and came across this video from a relatively small Mario Kart Youtuber named Bayesic. He describes in great detail how player stats in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe are calculated and used in game, and how to optimize a build and strategy through the lens of Pareto optimality. He builds a dashboard to optimize any given set of stats.
